Summary: Orange object flew over Kleive in an east to west horizontal trajectory.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Molde
There was one other sighting in Molde on or around January 25th 2009
divs: sighting detailskleive, norway, scandinavia sunday, 25 january 2009, 0:40 a.m. my father saw an orange object flying in an east to west direction. he then alerted me. the object flew very slowly, straight above kleive (small village). and, no sound could be heard from the object, when i went outside to get a better view. the object flew in a steady horizontal path and at an altitude of circa 500 metres. suddenly the orange light dimmed and the light on the object was turned off or it disappeared into a cloud. no blinking was observed on the object. i noticed that the neighbour's dog barked intensely, as long as the object was in sight. the dog stopped to bark, when the object disappeared. the duration of the sighting was approximately 3 minutes. sincerely, {pid} {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
